definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Old World herb related to fenugreek.
sentences.chinese: 与葫芦巴相关的旧大陆草本植物。

sentences.english: Fenugreek seed comprises seed coat, endosperm and embryo .
sentences.chinese: 葫芦巴籽由种皮，胚乳和胚组成。

definition: Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
tuber of the kudzu vine (Pueraria lobata), used in Chinese medicine
